text.en: Oṃ. May this be accomplished, O compassionate and Noble Tārā.
text.en-trans: om, drubpar gyur chik jetsün tukjé chen

text.en: Through the power and blessings of this practice of approach and accomplishment,
text.en-trans: pakma khyö la nyendrub chöpa dang

text.en: Offerings and praise, and prayers made to you, Noble Tārā,
text.en-trans: tö ching solwa tabpé tu jin gyi

text.en: From this moment on, until we reach awakening,
text.en-trans: deng né zung té changchub matob bar

text.en: May we never be separated from you, Noble Saviouress,
text.en-trans: pakma khyö dang taktu mindral zhing

text.en: May we have good health and long life, and may our wangtang and resources increase.
text.en-trans: nemé tsé wang longchö pelwa dang

text.en: May there be no obstacles to our accomplishing awakening,
text.en-trans: changchub drub la barchö minjung zhing

text.en: And may we swiftly perfect the qualities of the paths and bhūmis.
text.en-trans: sa dang lam gyi yönten nyur dzok né

text.en: May we attain omniscience and complete enlightenment,
text.en-trans: dakzhen dön nyi lhün gyi drubpa yi
